sentence.Network_en: It isn't yet clear whether the new law can actually be applied retroactively.
sentence.Network_cn: 新法令是否具有追溯力还不清楚。

sentence.Network_en: Travel pay former wound Jiangxi Lushan Mountain husband and wife retroactively!
sentence.Network_cn: 原创江西庐山夫妻游,补发!

PerfectNetExp.abs: retroactive 反动的retroactively 逆动地retroactivity 追溯既往
3. 退却retroactively 追溯地retrospect 回顾
反动,反作用,倒行逆施 retroaction 反动,反作用,倒行逆施 retroactive 反动的,追溯的,有追溯力的 retroactively 反动地;追溯地 retroactivity 追溯既往.
LHP Andy Pettitte was retroactively placed on the 15-day DL . he is eligible to come off on Saturday .小派被回溯地列入15日伤兵名单中.他可望在星期六归队.

list.abs: ...而多半是由于该学习活动之后又学习了新事物,以后回忆时,新学习对旧学习发生了干扰作用使然,缪勒称此种新学习干扰旧学习记忆的心理干扰作用为倒摄抑制,retroactive inhibition,直到现在,倒摄抑制依然是解释遗忘现象的主要理论之一,惟以后心理学家补充了缪勒的理论,都认为除新学习.
retroaction 反作用retroactive adjustment 追溯性调整retroactive effect 反馈作用
retro-type lens 负透镜retroactive receiver 再生接收机retrogressive winding 倒退绕组
retroactive adjustment 追溯性调整retroactive effect 反馈作用retroactive 反作用的；追溯的

entry.def: If a decision or action is retroactive, it is intended to take effect from a date in the past.

example.ex: There are few precedents for this sort of retroactive legislation.
example.tran: 这种有追溯力的法规鲜有先例。

auth_sentence.content: Science can't retroactively fit theory to future facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science can't retroactively fit theory to future facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science can't retroactively fit theory to future facts.

auth_sentence.content: You can't deal with that retroactively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can't deal with that retroactively.

auth_sentence.content: Biller's words now retroactively assumed a coherent, four-footed shape.
auth_sentence.res_content: Biller's words now retroactively assumed a coherent, four-footed shape.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Biller's words now retroactively assumed a coherent, four-footed shape.
